text: The 2019 FIS Ski Jumping Grand Prix is the 26th Summer Grand Prix season in ski jumping on plastic for men and the 8th for ladies. Other competitive circuits this season include the World Cup, Continental Cup, FIS Cup, FIS Race and Alpen Cup. == Calendar == === Men === {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="background:#fff; font-size:86%;
